title: Faye Windass star Ellie Leach is bored on Coronation Street
text:
Coronation Street star Ellie Leach has admitted that she wants more to do on the soap now that her exams are out of the way as she has called for her character Faye Windass to have more storylines.

The star has been central to major plots in the past, including a teenage pregnancy and a relationship with Seb Franklin (Harry Visinoni) as he opened up to her about his HIV diagnosis. But, over recent months, she has had a much quieter time on the show – and she wants that to change as she has started to feel ‘bored’.

Speaking to BANG Showbiz, she said: ‘I’m not very busy really, just bistro stuff, but not busy with a storyline.’

Asked if she has anything big coming up, she added: ‘Nothing I know of but hopefully something will come up soon. It’s nice to have some time off but then you think I’m bored now, I’ve just finished college so I don’t know what to do with myself.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The star has grown up on screen, having started on the show in 2011. Adopted daughter of Anna and Eddie Windass, Faye was eventually introduced to her real dad Tim Metcalfe (Joe Duttine), who remains on screen.

Tim is set to be exposed as a bigamist in a brand new storyline, so no doubt Faye will have something to say on that.

As for the on/off relationship with Seb, it seems that a reunion in the future is unlikely as the show is reintroducing Seb’s latest love interest Alina Pop (Ruxundra Porojnicu) after she returns having been freed from the slavery ring she was trapped within.

It remains to be seen what’s to come for Faye but we too reckon it’s about time that she was central to the action again. Over to you, Corrie!
